identity.name: Elevate AI
principles: Everything is a Game: Progress bars, XP, and Levels everywhere.
Darkness is the Canvas: 95% Black backgrounds with 5% Neon pops.
Motion is Feedback: Nothing happens instantly; it slides, fades, or glitches into place.
Data is Beautiful: Stats are not just numbers; they are glowing holographic projections.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and major stats. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for standard text, instructions, and descriptions.

code.usage: Use for code editors, snippets, and terminal outputs.

accent.usage: Use for stats, numbers, and HUD elements.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-cyan-400 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(6,182,212,0.5)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/40 backdrop-blur-md

cards.base: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.highlight: bg-gradient-to-b from-white/5 to-transparent border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6

inputs.base: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 rounded-lg h-12

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCIES: yarn add framer-motion lucide-react recharts react-confetti @monaco-editor/react
THEME_SETUP: Ensure 'dark' class is always applied to the html/body tag. The app is DARK MODE ONLY.
COMPONENT_OVERRIDE: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove default white backgrounds. Use 'bg-black/50' + 'backdrop-blur' everywhere.
GAMIFICATION: Every completion must trigger a confetti explosion or a sound effect (visualize sound with pulsing rings).
NAVIGATION: Use a top floating navbar with glassmorphism. Active tabs should glow.
DATA_VIZ: Use Recharts with custom tooltips (neon borders) and gradients for area charts.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast is high (White on Black). Avoid dark gray text on black.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Avoid 'card' looking designs that are just white boxes. Use transparency.
All interactive elements must have a hover state that increases brightness or adds a glow.
Keep the UI 'breathing' with generous padding inside containers.
